Overview.head: Indicators
Overview.info: Provide 4 key operational indicators, each of which can be compared periodically.

Overview.head: Passing-by Traffic/Visitors/Revenue
Overview.info: Show each site's business situation in terms of the following three parameters: passing-by traffic, visitors and revenue.

Overview.head: Ranking
Overview.info: Rank the sites according to key indicators such as revenue, transactions, and revenue per transaction.

Overview.head: Performance Scatter Chart
Overview.info: Shows the performance scatter chart for each site according to the type of analysis, which is based on key point indicators. The dotted line represents the average for each indicator.

Overview.head: Map
Overview.info: sites location overview. Move the mouse pointer to the dots to spread out details.

ProfitAnalysis.head: Profit Ranking
ProfitAnalysis.info: Site ranking based on gross margin.

ProfitAnalysis.head: Profit VS Revenue Scatter Chart
ProfitAnalysis.info: By analyzing the distribution of gross profit and revenue for each site, list the items to be improved and the standards that have been met by each site.

Forecast.head: Revenue Forecast
Forecast.info: Based on the forecast data and the actual revenue data for the last 3 weeks, predict the site's revenue trend for the next week.

Forecast.head: Transaction Forecast
Forecast.info: Based on the forecast data and the actual data for the last 3 weeks on the transactions, predict the trend of the transactions in the site for the next week.

Forecast.head: Visitors Forecast
Forecast.info: Based on the forecast data and the actual data for the last 3 weeks on the number of visitors, predict the trend of visitors in the site for the next week.

BrandAnalysis.head: Revenue/Transaction Trends
BrandAnalysis.info: Compare and contrast between the sum of revenue and the sum of transactions from selected sites.

BrandAnalysis.head: Turn in Rate/Visitors/Transaction Trends
BrandAnalysis.info: Compare and contrast between the sum of Turn in Rate and the sum of Visitors from selected sites.

BrandAnalysis.head: Trends Cross Analysis
BrandAnalysis.info: Compare and contrast of 8 indicators among selected sites, maximum slection to 3 sites.

MarketingAnalysis.head: Marketing Cross Analysis
MarketingAnalysis.info: Provide multiple parameters, such as type and time, to comprehensively analyze and display each site's business situation.

MarketingAnalysis.head: Marketing Time-on-time Analysis
MarketingAnalysis.info: Provide day-on-day, week-on-week and year-on-year filters to perform the periodic time-on-time analysis and to show each site's marketing operate.

MarketingAnalysis.head: Cross Site Analysis
MarketingAnalysis.info: Provide filter criteria, such as type and time. Trend comparison and total comparison of business data can be performed between different sites.

TrafficAnalysis.head: Heat-map Cross Analysis
TrafficAnalysis.info: To show the daily and weekly traffic by heat-map cross analysis.

TrafficAnalysis.head: Traffic Cross Analysis
TrafficAnalysis.info: Provide multiple parameters, such as type and time, to comprehensively analyze and display each site's customer traffic.

TrafficAnalysis.head: Traffic Time-on-time Analysis
TrafficAnalysis.info: Provide day-on-day, week-on-week and year-on-year filter to perform the traffic periodic time-on-time traffic analysis and to show each site's customer traffic.

TrafficAnalysis.head: Cross Site Analysis
TrafficAnalysis.info: Provide filters, such as type and time. Trend comparison and total comparison of customer traffic data can be performed between different sites.

SingleAnalysis.head: Heat-map Cross Analysis
SingleAnalysis.info: To show the daily and weekly traffic by heat-map cross analysis.

SingleAnalysis.head: Traffic Cross Analysis
SingleAnalysis.info: Provide multiple parameters, such as type and time, to comprehensively analyze and display each site's customer traffic.

SingleAnalysis.head: Traffic Time-on-time Analysis
SingleAnalysis.info: Provide day-on-day, week-on-week and year-on-year filter to perform the traffic periodic time-on-time traffic analysis and to show each site's customer traffic.

SingleAnalysis.head: Cross Group Analysis
SingleAnalysis.info: Provide filters, such as type and time. Trend comparison and total comparison of customer traffic data can be performed between different groups.

MultipleAnalysis.head: Heat-map Cross Analysis
MultipleAnalysis.info: To show the daily and weekly traffic by heat-map cross analysis.

MultipleAnalysis.head: Traffic Cross Analysis
MultipleAnalysis.info: Provide multiple parameters, such as type and time, to comprehensively analyze and display each site's customer traffic.

MultipleAnalysis.head: Traffic Time-on-time Analysis
MultipleAnalysis.info: Provide day-on-day, week-on-week and year-on-year filter to perform the traffic periodic time-on-time traffic analysis and to show each site's customer traffic.

MultipleAnalysis.head: Cross Site Analysis
MultipleAnalysis.info: Provide filters, such as type and time. Trend comparison and total comparison of customer traffic data can be performed between different sites.

ReturnAnalysis.head: Returning Heat-map & Proportion Analysis
ReturnAnalysis.info: Shows the proportion of repeat customers during a given period and shows the daily and weekly repeat customers by heat-map analysis.

ReturnAnalysis.head: Returning Trend Analysis
ReturnAnalysis.info: Provide multiple parameters, such as type and time, to comprehensively analyze and display the customer traffic trend.

ReturnAnalysis.head: Returning Time-On-Time Analysis
ReturnAnalysis.info: Provide week-on-week and year-on-year filters to perform the returning costumer periodic time-on-time analysis and to show the site's customer traffic trend.

ReturnAnalysis.head: Returning Visiting Frequency Analysis
ReturnAnalysis.info: Displays the periodic trend and the number of visits (1, 2, or 3 or more times) .

BrandItems.head: Product Category Ranking
BrandItems.info: Mark the top 6 products with a different color.

BrandItems.head: Product Ranking
BrandItems.info: Mark the top 6 products with a different color.

BrandItems.head: Product Sales Trends
BrandItems.info: Displays sales trends for each item. Select up to two items for cross-time comparison.

BrandItems.head: Product Time-on-time Analysis
BrandItems.info: Provide year-on-year, week-on-week and month-on-month filters and perform cycle year-on-year analysis and display for each item.

ReportKPI.head: Report KPI
ReportKPI.info: Based on the revenue, turn in rate, transactions, visitors and revenue per transaction to evaluate the site's operate comprehensively.

ReportMarketing.head: Business Data Report
ReportMarketing.info: Provide the marketing report export function. The range is up to 365 days of data. The range is in hours, up to 90 days.

ReportPassenger.head: Traffic Data Report
ReportPassenger.info: Provide the export traffic flow report function. The interval can be up to 365 days by day, and the interval can be up to 90 days.

ReportProduct.head: Product Data Report
ReportProduct.info: Provides the item export report function. The interval is up to 365 days of data. The interval is up to 90 days of data.
